comments.body: i haven't used this before, but the docs seems to indicate setting `less = <options>`, not `less.options = <options>` http://lesscss.org/usage/#using-less-in-the-browser-options
errr, just saw the [update to V2](http://lesscss.org/usage/#v2-upgrade-guide-browser-usage). seems good

Theres some weirdness with the way you configure less. As you pointed out the docs say that you have to declare a global variable called less prior to less being loaded. Once less has been loaded that options object is then stored within lessStatic
